title: Majutsu Gakuin wo Shuseki de Sotsugyoushita Ore ga Boukensha wo Hajimeru no wa Sonna ni Okashii Darou ka
original_name: 魔術学院を首席で卒業した俺が冒険者を始めるのはそんなにおかしいだろうか
sinopse:
Having graduated from the prestigious Witchcraft Institute at the top of his class, no job is out of reach for William Glenford. But William dreams of only one thing: adventures.

(Source: Kamikoto Scans)
